title: Glucose Balance 90c by Protocol
description: Glucose Balance 90c by Protocol is a dietary ingredient extracted from the herb Lagerstroemia speciosa. GlucoFit´s active component, corosolic acid, has shown in scientific studies to support healthy glucose levels already within the normal range. Buy Glucose Balance 90c online with free shipping.
cleaned_text: Description Supports Healthy Blood Sugar Supports Glucose Metabolism Minimizes Sweet Cravings 10% of profits donated for health research Dietary Supplement Ingredients: Serving Size: Contains - Gelatin (capsule), Rice Flour, Magnesium Stearate (vegetable source) Does Not Contain - Sugar, Salt, Yeast, Wheat, Gluten, Corn, Soy, Milk, Egg, Shellfish, Preservatives Dosage: As a dietary supplement, take 1 capsule 3 times daily with meals.
